document.introduction: Hello, My name is [NAME] at home. I'm calling from StrategyOne, a national market research and public opinion polling firm. Today we are conducting an opinion poll and I would like to ask a few questions. We are not selling anything, and I won't ask for a contribution or a donation. The entire poll should take approximately 15 minutes. May we continue?
document.instructions: I would like to read to you a series of statements. For each please tell me whether you strongly agree, somewhat agree, somewhat disagree or strongly disagree with the statement. The first statement is [INSERT STATEMENT].

questions.question: I wish there was more information available about the dangers of smoking cigarettes.
I am concerned about my children smoking and will do everything in my power to prevent them from starting.
I wish I had more time to sit and talk to my kids about tough issues like under-age drinking, drugs and smoking.
I find it difficult to talk to my children about tough issues like under-age drinking, drugs and smoking.
